page.title: 11A day in school, Bridlington
page.content: If it is Monday, Tuesday or Thursday we go to assembly after registration, otherwise we have a form period. At 9:20am we go to lessons, there are two lessons to begin with then a twenty minute break and then two more. We just sit and talk at break. If I go home for dinner I make myself a quick snack and watch TV. Sometimes I stay at school for lunch. After the afternoon lessons we go home. I walk so far with my friends then the rest of the way by myself. When I get home I usually throw my bag and coat down, find something to eat and just literally lounge about. Around 4:45pm I go to my room, put the radio on full blast and{attempt}my homework. At 5:10 pm I change or get a shower and after tea get ready to go out. I usually get in from town at about 9:30pm. I watch TV. (Written by Jackie Warneford)
